languages.text: "Вера. Щит, дарованный Императором слугам Его. Неужели ты не распознал{mf||а} свет нашего защитника, {name}?" {n}Чорда выглядит умиротворенной, и голос ее смягчается. Лицо ее абсолютно спокойно, и тревожный нервный тик больше не касается его.{/n}

"Faith. A shield gifted by the Emperor to His servants. Did you not recognise the light of our protector, {name}?" {n}Chorda looks serene, and her voice has mellowed. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by her nervous tic.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вера. Щит, дарованный Императором слугам Его. Неужели ты не распознал{mf||а} свет нашего защитника, {name}?" {n}Чорда выглядит умиротворенной, и голос ее смягчается. Лицо ее абсолютно спокойно, и тревожный нервный тик больше не касается его.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Faith. A shield gifted by the Emperor to His servants. Have you not recognised the light of our protector, {name}?" {n}Chorda looks serene; her voice is more gentle now. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by the anxiety tic.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Faith. A shield gifted by the Emperor to His servants. Have you not recognised the light of our protector, {name}?" {n}Chorda looks serene; her voice is more gentle now. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by the anxiety tic.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Faith. A shield gifted by the Emperor to His servants. Have you not recognised the light of our protector, {name}?" {n}Chorda looks serene; her voice mellows. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by the anxiety tic.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Faith. A shield gifted by the Emperor to His servants. Have you not recognised the light of our protector, {name}?" {n}Chorda looks serene; her voice mellows. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by the anxiety tic.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Faith. A shield gifted by the Emperor to His servants. Did you not recognise the light of our protector, {name}?" {n}Chorda looks serene, and her voice has mellowed. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by her nervous tic.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Faith. A shield gifted by the Emperor to His servants. Did you not recognise the light of our protector, {name}?" {n}Chorda looks serene, and her voice has mellowed. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by her nervous tic.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “是信仰的力量，信仰便是帝皇亲手赐予的盾牌。莫非你没有认出我们的守护神的明光吗，{name}？”{n}库尔达神色安详，声音柔和。她的表情完全平静下来，不再有任何焦虑不安。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Faith. A shield gifted by the Emperor to His servants. Did you not recognise the light of our protector, {name}?" {n}Chorda looks serene, and her voice has mellowed. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by her nervous tic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “是信仰的力量，信仰便是帝皇亲手赐予的盾牌。莫非你没有认出我们的守护神的明光吗，{name}？”{n}库尔达神色安详，声音柔和。她的表情完全平静下来，不再有任何焦虑不安。{/n}
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「信念。それは、皇帝が使いの者達に贈った盾。{name}、我ら守護者の光に気が付かなかったのか？」{n}チョーダは穏やかな表情をしており、その声は優しいものになっている。もう、緊張による震えは止まったようだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Faith. A shield gifted by the Emperor to His servants. Did you not recognise the light of our protector, {name}?" {n}Chorda looks serene, and her voice has mellowed. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by her nervous tic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「信念。それは、皇帝が使いの者達に贈った盾。{name}、我ら守護者の光に気が付かなかったのか？」{n}チョーダは穏やかな表情をしており、その声は優しいものになっている。もう、緊張による震えは止まったようだった。{/n}
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «Fe. Un escudo regalado por el Emperador a Sus siervos. ¿No ha reconocido la luz de nuestro Protector, {name}?». {n}Chorda parece serena y su voz se ha suavizado. Su cara está calmada: ya no sufre el tic nervioso.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Faith. A shield gifted by the Emperor to His servants. Did you not recognise the light of our protector, {name}?" {n}Chorda looks serene, and her voice has mellowed. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by her nervous tic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Fe. Un escudo regalado por el Emperador a Sus siervos. ¿No ha reconocido la luz de nuestro protector, {name}?». {n}Chorda parece serena. Su voz se suaviza. Su cara está calmada, ya no la visita el tic de la ansiedad.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Glaube. Der Imperator hat seinen Dienern den Schild geschenkt. Habt Ihr das Licht unseres Beschützers nicht erkannt, {name}?" {n}Chorda sieht friedlich aus. Ihre Stimme wird sanfter. Ihre Miene ist vollkommen ruhig, nicht länger von dem nervösen Zucken geplagt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Faith. A shield gifted by the Emperor to His servants. Did you not recognise the light of our protector, {name}?" {n}Chorda looks serene, and her voice has mellowed. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by her nervous tic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Glaube. Der Imperator hat seinen Dienern den Schild geschenkt. Habt Ihr das Licht unseres Beschützers nicht erkannt, {name}?" {n}Chorda sieht friedlich aus. Ihre Stimme wird sanfter. Ihre Miene ist vollkommen ruhig, nicht länger von dem nervösen Zucken geplagt.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « La foi, ce bouclier que l'Empereur confère à Ses serviteurs. N'avez-vous pas reconnu la lumière de notre Protecteur, {name} ? » {n}Chorda semble sereine, sa voix se fait douce. Vous ne voyez plus le moindre tic nerveux sur son visage parfaitement détendu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Faith. A shield gifted by the Emperor to His servants. Did you not recognise the light of our protector, {name}?" {n}Chorda looks serene, and her voice has mellowed. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by her nervous tic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « La foi, ce bouclier que l'Empereur confère à Ses serviteurs. N'avez-vous pas reconnu la lumière de notre Protecteur, {name} ? » {n}Chorda semble sereine, sa voix se fait douce. Vous ne voyez plus le moindre tic d'anxiété sur son visage parfaitement détendu.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "İnanç. Kalkan ve bu kuvvetli kılıç, İmparator tarafından O'nun hizmetkârlarına armağan edilir. Koruyucumuzun ışığını tanıyamadın mı {name}?" {n}Sesi yumuşayan Chorda, huzurlu görünüyor. Yüz ifadesi son derece sakin ve gerginlikten kaynaklı tiki artık ortaya çıkmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Faith. A shield gifted by the Emperor to His servants. Did you not recognise the light of our protector, {name}?" {n}Chorda looks serene, and her voice has mellowed. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by her nervous tic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İnanç. Kalkan ve bu kuvvetli kılıç, İmparator tarafından O'nun hizmetkârlarına armağan edilir. Koruyucu'muzun ışığını tanıyamadın mı {name}?" {n}Chorda huzurlu görünüyor. Sesi de yumuşamış durumda. Yüz ifadesi son derece sakin ve gerginlikten kaynaklı o tik artık ortaya çıkmıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chorda
